chunks.query_chunk_text: Integrable Lattice Models From Gauge Theory Edward Witten School of Natural Sciences, Institute for Advanced Study Einstein Drive, Princeton, NJ 08540 USA Abstract These notes provide an introduction to recent work by Kevin Costello in which integrable lattice models of classical statistical mechanics in two dimensions are understood in terms of quantum gauge theory in four dimensions This construction will be compared to the more familiar relationship between quantum knot invariants in three di...
